title: (Minister of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Appointment of Special Advisers 
(Minister of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order
text_norm: 1 order may cited appointment special adviser (minister state department agriculture food marine) order

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order
(Minister of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order
heading: Jack O’Donnell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the
text_raw:
2. 

Jack O’Donnell, particulars of whose address have been deposited at the 
offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed to 
be a Special Adviser to Pippa Hackett, Minister of State at the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, with effect from 24 January 2022.
text_norm: 2 jack donnell particular whose address deposited office department agriculture food marine appointed special adviser pippa hackett minister state department agriculture food marine effect 24 january 2022

title: (Minister of State at the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine) Order
heading: 3. Declan O’Rourke, particulars of whose address have been deposited at
text_raw:
3. Declan O’Rourke, particulars of whose address have been deposited at 
the offices of the Department of Agriculture, Food and the Marine, is appointed 
to be a Special Adviser to Pippa Hackett, Minister of State at the Department of 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, with effect from 1 March 2022. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

20 April, 2022. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th April, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [199] 3
